subtitle: A fun starter for grown ups and kids.

method.text: Place the potatoes on a baking tray. Brush all over with the oil. Sprinkle with a little salt. Cook in the oven for 1 hour until tender and crisp.
Cut each potato in half. Carefully scoop out a little of the filling, leaving a shell and a layer of the potato next to the skin. Cut in half again.
Lay one strip of the cheese along the length of each wedge. Season to taste. Wrap one rasher of bacon around each wedge.
Place on a lightly greased baking tray. Return to the oven and cook for 10-15 min until golden and crispy.
Meanwhile, mix the dip ingredients together in a bowl. Serve with the hot wedges.

title: Bacon wrapped potato wedges with herby dip
